title: I played the Elden Ring preview build. #shorts

transcript_chunks.text: i got to play the final preview build for eldon ring here's a couple things i noticed during the closed network test you could choose from five different builds in the final preview build there are 10 classes you can choose from the newer ones are prisoner confessor wretch vagabond bandit astrologer and my personal favorite the samurai champion got rebranded to hero the enchanted knight and the bloody wolf are no longer options the character creator is fantastic it's as robust and as detailed as you wanted to be and i guarantee you can make some really ugly looking dudes i was able to find a secret alley so i can get past stormville castle and keep traveling north so i could finally see leonia it was foggy flooded those big ass lobsters everywhere it was it was a bad vibe honestly some of my favorite things about from software games are talking to npcs you didn't even know existed experiencing really neat secrets and easter eggs and the idea that we're getting that along with the dark

my favorite things about from software games are talking to npcs you didn't even know existed experiencing really neat secrets and easter eggs and the idea that we're getting that along with the dark souls formula on a gigantic open world scale it's it's perfect this is my game of the year front runner it's barely january holy it's really february
